faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What game modes are available in Counter-Strike 2 at launch? 'Deathmatch,' 'Casual,' 'Wingman,' 'Competitive,' and 'Premier Mode.'
faq.question2: Is Counter-Strike 2 available on Mac? No, Counter-Strike 2 cannot be played directly on macOS..
faq.question3: Is the «CS:GO 360 Stats» feature available in Counter-Strike 2? No. Since «CS:GO 360 Stats» is no longer available, all subscribers will be refunded for the last month. The «CS:GO 360 Stats» subscription will no longer be renewed.
faq.question4: I didn't receive the «CS:GO Music Kit» and «CS:GO Medal». Can I still get them?No. The «CS:GO Music Kit» and «CS:GO Medal» were automatically granted to accounts that met the requirements. If you didn’t receive them, your account did not qualify. Steam Support cannot provide these items.
faq.question5: I have feedback or a request regarding Counter-Strike 2. Where should I send it? If you want to reach out about Counter-Strike 2—suggest an idea, request a new feature, or ask for something from CS:GO that didn't make it into CS2—send an email to the Counter-Strike team at: cs2team @ valvesoftware dot com.
secondFloorTitle: THE NEW ERA OF COUNTER-STRIKE HAS BEGUN!
secondFloorDesc: Counter-Strike 2 is the biggest technological leap in the history of the series, bringing new features and content for years to come. Counter-Strike 2 is a free upgrade to CS:GO. So, gear up, sharpen your skills, and get ready for the changes ahead! Read on to learn about some of the new features in Counter-Strike 2.
thirdFloorTitle: THE NEW ERA OF COUNTER-STRIKE HAS BEGUN!
thirdFloorDesc: Sub-tick structure is the foundation of Counter-Strike 2. Previously, servers processed changes on the map only at specific intervals—called 'ticks'. However, the new architecture allows the Counter-Strike 2 server to instantly register when you take a step, fire a shot, or throw a grenade. As a result, movement and shooting have become more responsive, and grenades always follow the same trajectory.
fourthFloorTitle: THE TIME HAS COME FOR COUNTER-STRIKE 2
fourthFloorDesc: The Counter-Strike community participated in the limited CS2 test for several months, helping us improve the game with their feedback. Join millions of players who are already honing their skills and reaching new heights. Welcome to Counter-Strike 2.
